## ğŸ¨ Brand Overview

### Identity
- **Name:** GONADS
- **Tagline:** Balls to the Wall DeFi
- **Industry:** Web3 / NFT / DeFi
- **Style:** Bold, Playful, Community-Driven

### Personality
- Bold & Audacious
- Playfully Irreverent
- Community-Driven
- Meme-Savvy
- Unapologetically Fun

### Target Audience
- **Demographics:** 25-40 years old, crypto-native developers
- **Psychographics:** Early adopters, meme enthusiasts, community-oriented
- **Behaviors:** Active on Discord/Twitter, NFT collectors, DeFi participants

---

## ğŸ¨ Color Palette

### Primary Colors
| Name | Hex | RGB | Usage |
|------|-----|-----|-------|
| Ballsy Purple | `#9333EA` | `147, 51, 234` | Primary CTAs, headings |
| Testicular Teal | `#14B8A6` | `20, 184, 166` | Secondary CTAs, accents |
| Vitality Orange | `#F97316` | `249, 115, 22` | Accent, urgent CTAs |

### Background Colors
| Name | Hex | Usage |
|------|-----|-------|
| Midnight Meme | `#0F172A` | Primary background |
| Slate 800 | `#1E293B` | Card backgrounds |
| Moonshot White | `#F8FAFC` | Light mode (optional) |

### Gradients
```css
/* Primary Gradient */
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #9333EA 0%, #14B8A6 100%);

/* Accent Gradient */
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #F97316 0%, #9333EA 100%);
```

---

## ğŸ”¤ Typography

### Font Stack
- **Headings:** Inter (700, 800, 900)
- **Body:** Inter (400, 500, 600)
- **Monospace:** JetBrains Mono (400, 700)

### Type Scale
```
6xl: 60px - Hero headings
5xl: 48px - Page headings
4xl: 36px - Section headings
3xl: 30px - Card titles
2xl: 24px - Subheadings
xl:  20px - Small headings
base: 16px - Body text
```

---

## ğŸ–¼ï¸ Logo System

### 3 Logo Variations

1. **Wordmark Logo**
   - File: `logos/wordmark.html`
   - Usage: Primary brand identifier
   - Features: Gradient text, animated glow dot

2. **Combination Logo**
   - File: `logos/combination.html`
   - Usage: Headers, social media
   - Features: Icon + text + tagline

3. **Badge Logo**
   - File: `logos/badge.html`
   - Usage: App icons, avatars
   - Features: Circular design, rotating animation

### Export Formats
- HTML/CSS (interactive, animated)
- SVG (vector, scalable)
- PNG (raster, transparent background)

## âš›ï¸ Component Library

### 5 Production-Ready Components

#### Button Component
```tsx
import { Button } from '@/components';

<Button variant="primary" size="lg">
  Grab Your Gonads
</Button>
```

**Variants:** `primary` | `secondary` | `accent` | `ghost`
**Sizes:** `sm` | `md` | `lg`

#### Input Component
```tsx
import { Input } from '@/components';

<Input
  label="Email Address"
  type="email"
  placeholder="your@email.com"
  error="Invalid email"
/>
```

#### Card Component
```tsx
import { Card, CardTitle, CardContent } from '@/components';

<Card variant="glow" hoverable>
  <CardTitle>Mint Your Gonads</CardTitle>
  <CardContent>
    <p>Get your pair before they're gone!</p>
  </CardContent>
</Card>
```

**Variants:** `default` | `gradient` | `glow`

#### Header Component
```tsx
import { Header } from '@/components';

<Header
  onConnectWallet={handleConnect}
  walletAddress={address}
/>
```

#### Footer Component
```tsx
import { Footer } from '@/components';

<Footer />
```

---

## ğŸ¯ Design Tokens

### W3C DTCG Compliant

All design tokens follow the [W3C Design Token Community Group](https://design-tokens.github.io/community-group/) specification.

**Token File:** `design-tokens.json`

**Categories:**
- Colors (brand, neutral, semantic, gradients)
- Typography (families, sizes, weights, line-heights)
- Spacing (xs to 5xl)
- Border Radius (sm to full)
- Shadows (including glow effects)
- Animations (durations, easing)
- Z-Index (layering system)

### Integration with Tailwind CSS

```javascript
// tailwind.config.ts
import tokens from './design-tokens.json';

export default {
  theme: {
    extend: {
      colors: {
        brand: {
          primary: tokens.color.brand.primary.$value,
          secondary: tokens.color.brand.secondary.$value,
        },
      },
    },
  },
};
```

---

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### Local Preview

```bash
# Navigate to preview directory
cd brands/gonads-io/preview

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run development server
npm run dev

# Open browser
open http://localhost:3001
```

### Deploy to Production

```bash
# Build for production
npm run build

# Deploy to Vercel
npm run deploy

# Or manual deploy
vercel --prod
```

### Configure Custom Domain

1. Add DNS record:
   - Type: `CNAME`
   - Name: `gonads.preview`
   - Value: `cname.vercel-dns.com`

2. Add to Vercel project:
   - Domain: `gonads.preview.machups.com`

See [DEPLOY.md](./DEPLOY.md) for detailed instructions.

## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

### Frontend
- **Framework:** Next.js 14 (App Router)
- **Language:** TypeScript
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS v3
- **Icons:** Lucide React
- **Fonts:** Google Fonts (Inter)

### Deployment
- **Hosting:** Vercel Edge Network
- **CDN:** Global distribution
- **SSL:** Automatic HTTPS
- **Analytics:** Vercel Analytics (built-in)

### Design System
- **Tokens:** W3C DTCG compliant
- **Components:** React + TypeScript
- **Documentation:** Markdown

## ğŸ¯ Use Cases

### For 5-Member Dev Team

#### Team Collaboration
1. **Designers** â†’ Use design tokens for consistency
2. **Frontend Devs** â†’ Import React components
3. **Backend Devs** â†’ Reference brand colors in APIs
4. **Marketing** â†’ Use logos and brand guidelines
5. **Product** â†’ Maintain brand coherence

#### Component Integration
```tsx
// Import components across projects
import { Button, Card, Header, Footer } from '@gonads/components';

// Use in your app
export default function MyPage() {
  return (
    <>
      <Header />
      <Card>
        <Button variant="primary">Action</Button>
      </Card>
      <Footer />
    </>
  );
}
```

#### Token Usage
```css
/* Use design tokens */
.my-button {
  background: var(--color-brand-primary);
  padding: var(--spacing-md);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  font-family: var(--font-heading);
}
```
